lines.text: You don't have to yell at me because I'm a little obnoxious
I guess, if you don't have to, you want to, hunh?
Well, even if you don't want to, you may have to, so... might as well want to.

[laughs]
I guesss if you don't want to, and you don't have to, you just don't if you don't want to.
Yeah, well, you can always take a Streetcar.

[During a dream]
I've got it! I'll marry all three of them.

[With Dick and Harry]
All three of us?

[With Dick and Harry]
Do you think it'd work?
Why not? I think the four of us would make a lovely couple.
